snippet: Retirement can lead to boredom and depression, a therapist advises. Ask how you want to spend your time, she says, and remember your childhood dreams....

headline.main: Stone Wins Sunshine Tour Order of Merit
headline.print_headline: Stone Wins Sunshine Tour Order of Merit

lead_paragraph: Retirement can lead to boredom and depression, a therapist advises. Ask how you want to spend your time, she says, and remember your childhood dreams.
